instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Nanesemo jo na čisto in suho kožo.

security-warning.varnostna-opozorila: Mazilo ne sme priti v stik z očmi.

product-info.opis: Otroško hladilno mazilo na bazi ognjičevega olja z dodatkom vitaminov A in E varuje dojenčkovo kožo in preprečuje pojav osipa in vnetja. Nanašamo jo ob vsakem previjanju.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Lanolin, Polyglyceryl - 2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Petrolatum, Decyl Oleate, Cera Alba, Isopropyl Myristate,Phenoxyethanol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Ekstract, Magnesium Sulfate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polyglyceryl - 3 Diisostearate, Ethyllhexylglycerin, Glycine Soja Oil, Daucus Carota, Sativa Extract, Beta - Carotene, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Oleate, Citric Acid, Parfum, 2- Bromo - 2 - Nitropropane - 1,3 - Diol.
